title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather stakeholder input, and identify potential risks and constraints.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware and software components, integration points, and data flows. Ensure robust security measures, including end-to-end encryption, secure authentication protocols, and access controls. Address privacy concerns by minimizing data collection and implementing data protection mechanisms. Thoroughly evaluate ethical implications and potential misuse cases. Ensure compliance with all relevant laws, regulations, and industry standards related to firearms, biometrics, and data privacy.

title: Biometric Authentication Module
description: Design and develop the biometric authentication module, including fingerprint, iris, or other biometric recognition technologies.

title: Firearm Integration
description: Develop the hardware and software components required to integrate the biometric authentication module with firearms.

title: Event Tracking and Logging
description: Implement a secure and reliable system for tracking and logging firearm discharge events, including user authentication and event details.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement a secure database to store user biometric data, firearm information, and event logs. Ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations and implement robust encryption and access controls.

title: User Interface and Reporting
description: Develop a user-friendly interface for managing user accounts, biometric data, and accessing event logs and reports.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security standards and regulations, including data protection, access control, and auditing.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and Operations
description: Plan and execute the deployment of the system, including infrastructure setup, data migration, and ongoing monitoring and maintenance.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including user manuals, technical specifications, and training materials for end-users and support staff.
